[Fire Flower/Life Flower/Power Flower]
Fire Flowers grow in the central area of the Fire Source.
Life Flowers and Power Flowers grow all around the Fire Conquest area.
[Reward] After you collect three kinds of flowers you may get Fire Seeds, Ghost Souls, personal Conquest points, server Conquest points, Fire Source points, Scrolls: Summon Sacred Fire, and Eigis Armor Fragments. You'll be rewarded with the Divine Fire necessary to upgrade the Flame Spark ability only when you collect Fire Flowers.
